criteria:
The article must strictly satisfy all of the following criteria:
- Personal Experience: It is a first-hand account from a developer or team.
- Rarely Writing Manual Code: The article states, implies, or supports a reasonable inference that AI coding agents are now so accurate that the human rarely performs manual implementation.
- Clear Productivity Gains: The developer describes in quantitative terms materially faster delivery, higher throughput, or meaningful time savings due to AI assistance.
